artists.name: Matheo
artists.bio: Matheo is a passionate artist who loves to create unique pieces of art. He enjoys experimenting with different styles and techniques.

artists.name: Liam
artists.bio: Liam is a digital artist who specializes in creating stunning illustrations and concept art. He draws inspiration from nature and fantasy.

cycles.title: Portraits
cycles.description: Learn the art of portrait painting, focusing on capturing likeness and expression. This cycle will cover various techniques and styles.

cycles.title: Art Abstrait
cycles.description: Explore the world of abstract art, where you can express your emotions and ideas through colors and shapes. This cycle encourages creativity and experimentation.

teachers.name: John Doe
teachers.bio: John is a professional artist with over 10 years of experience in the field. He teaches various art techniques and styles.

teachers.name: Jane Smith
teachers.bio: Jane is a renowned painter known for her vibrant colors and unique compositions. She has exhibited her work in galleries worldwide.
